Module com.example.petcarecab302qu
Package com.example.petcarecab302qu.controller

Class DietController

java.lang.Object
com.example.petcarecab302qu.controller.NavigationController
com.example.petcarecab302qu.controller.DietController
public class DietController extends NavigationController
Controller class for managing diet plans. It uses SqliteDietDAO to handle database operations.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialises the UI and loads all diet plans from the database. This method is called when the UI is initialised.

    • handleAddDietPlan

      public void handleAddDietPlan(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action for adding a new diet plan. This method displays a form for the user to input diet details and save them.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the UI.

    • handleEditDietPlan

      public void handleEditDietPlan(DietPlan dietPlan)
      Adds a diet plan button to the UI dynamically. Each button represents a diet plan and can be clicked to load it for editing.
      Parameters:
      dietPlan - The diet plan to add to the UI.
